privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Data Collection
collection.content: We collect your email address, nickname, and password during signup. This information is used solely for authentication and user identification.

list: Allow you to log in securely

storage.title: 3. Data Storage
storage.content: Your information is stored securely and encrypted where applicable. We do not store plaintext passwords.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, unless required by law.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You can request to update or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us at koripSupport@gmail.com.

consent.title: 6. Consent
consent.content: By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this policy.
